item.title: Zarya Ability Overview | Overwatch

meta.summary:
b"Together we are strong: http://blizz.ly/MeetZarya 

Zarya is one of the world's strongest women, a celebrated athlete who sacrificed personal glory when her home was thrust into war. Now she uses her great strength to protect her family, friends, and country.

Deploying powerful personal barriers that convert incoming damage into energy for her particle cannon, Zarya is an invaluable asset on the front lines of any battle. When the enemy forces rally, a well-placed graviton surge can turn the tide of battle, drawing foes into its field and leaving them vulnerable.

Sign Up for Beta: http://bit.ly/JoinOverwatch 
Like Us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/playoverwatch 
Follow Us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/playoverwatch"

item.title: How to Use Zarya Bubbles Properly (lot of Guides get this WRONG)

meta.summary:
b'There's always going to be "better" bubbles you could've hit.
But don't focus so hard on that. First focus on the more important stuff (positioning, map control, blocking CC), and after time and experience you'll start to hit those "clutch" bubbles naturally!

This video will give a guideline on how you should use bubbles so that you can concentrate on more important parts of Zarya gameplay. I know Masters players who got to their rank doing nothing but bubbling their main tank.

A NOTE ABOUT ENERGY:
If you're following the guide, positioning as aggressively as possible using self-barrier as much as possible, and always getting a good opening bubble at the start of the fight, there should be no fight where you have less than 80 energy.

Music: Chris Brown - Don't Wake Me Up, TheFatRat Remix

My twitch: https://twitch.tv/cutefluffycats

Thanks to Nacho for helping me with the captions.'

item.title: Overwatch Advanced Zarya Guide: Shield Timings & Playstyle Breakdown

meta.summary:
b"Overwatch guide, Zarya is one of the most difficult heroes to master in all of Overwatch. Shield timings are the core of her capability, as it provides your team with crucial shielding but also will snowball your own lethality. There's still more to cover on Zarya, mastering her projectile alternate fire and landing her ultimate properly may require separate videos, but what was covered here must be mastered first before you worry about the rest, because if you can't shield properly, you're not going to get to the rest of her kit.

item.title: How GRANDMASTER Players DESTROY with Zarya - Overwatch Top 500 PRO Tricks | Harbleu Zarya Vod

meta.summary:
b'Today we are watching a top 500 zarya overwatch season 4 competitive ranked gameplay vod review with the player harbleu who is just a wonderful zarya player that roasts everyone with amazing flanking tactics and positioning at far range.








Playlist:https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLefC4eOMnbRF5Xm7uCjfU73bh0ybup9Df








thumbnail:http://68.media.tumblr.com/119ab7dfdaa6e2be7226eb411d2998fc/tumblr_od1cv4aZF31u01h3fo1_1280.png

video from:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qQexT_F7uNI








What is overwatch?: Well overwatch is Blizzards new take on the fps genre. In this game you choose a hero or "Class" to take on enemies, push payloads, and take control points. The point of the game is to beat the other team over and it is indeed a whole bunch of fun to play. The game includes 24 heroes so far and Is a blast to play. In this video I mostly go over playing it in a commentary type of manner, and these types of videos will usually be overwatch live commentaries or overwatch group commentaries. As well expect a few guides of this game in the future and some box openings as well. Anyways, hope you enjoy blizzards new hit!'

Who is JoeKing aka me. Im a overwatch youtuber that likes to talk about character updates, how to get better, and the competitive community. item.title: Overwatch How to Zarya: Aim Techniques and Target Priority

meta.summary:

item.title: SPREE - GRANDMASTER ZARYA GAMEPLAY TIPS | How To Improve As Zarya Guide - Overwatch Season 7

meta.summary:
b'----------------------------------------------------------------
JOIN A SCRIM THIS FRIDAY OR SATURDAY HERE : https://www.guilded.gg/matchmaking
----------------------------------------------------------------



Today we are back again trying a top 500 tip Zarya video because I think its fun and people just love Zarya it seems. Today we are talking about how the grandmaster Zarya player can carry his competitive games in season 7 overwatch competitive ranked mode guide for overwatch season 7 placement matches and overwatch season 7 changes. Going over some Zarya season 7 tips and guide or whatever you want to call it. I hope that these tips can help to have you guys learn how to improve as Zarya and hope this works as a mini Zarya guide tip trick thing for all that want to improve as her. Anyways, thanks! 




More Videos! : https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLefC4eOMnbRF5Xm7uCjfU73bh0ybup9Df



Gameplay: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q352MEytNeU
Thumbnail: https://img00.deviantart.net/55f0/i/2016/141/5/9/casual_zarya_by_monorirogue-da38d3o.jpg
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------



======================================================================

TIPS I WROTE DOWN FROM THE VIDEO:





======================================================================





What is overwatch?: Well overwatch is Blizzards new take on the fps genre. In this game you choose a hero or "Class" to take on enemies, push payloads, and take control points. The point of the game is to beat the other team over and it is indeed a whole bunch of fun to play. The game includes 27 heroes so far and Is a blast to play. In this video I mostly go over playing it in a commentary type of manner, and these types of videos will usually be overwatch live commentaries or overwatch group commentaries. As well expect a few guides of this game in the future and some box openings as well. Anyways, hope you enjoy blizzards new hit!'

Who is JoeKing aka me. Im a overwatch youtuber that likes to talk about character updates, how to get better, and the competitive community. Trying to help you get better at overwatch and entertain at the same time hopefully.
